targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `videos` WHERE downloaded IS NOT NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) as videos FROM videos WHERE online = 0 OR online = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `videos` WHERE downloaded IS NULL AND download_required = 1 AND copyright IS NULL AND videos.online = 1
SELECT statistic_value FROM statistics WHERE statistic_type = 'status' LIMIT 1
SELECT download_date AS time, number FROM `videos_downloaded_at_date` WHERE download_date > "2010-01-01 00:00:00"
SELECT COUNT(*) as videos,resolution FROM `videos` WHERE resolution IS NOT NULL GROUP BY resolution
SELECT COUNT(*) as video_count FROM videos WHERE downloaded IS NULL AND download_required = 1 AND copyright IS NOT NULL
SELECT SUM(size) FROM videos WHERE downloaded >= now() - INTERVAL 1 DAY;
SELECT statistic_date AS time, CAST(statistic_value AS SIGNED) AS archive_size FROM statistics WHERE statistic_type = 'archive_size';
SELECT COUNT(*) as videos FROM videos WHERE online = 4;
SELECT COUNT(*) as videos FROM videos WHERE videos.downloaded IS NULL AND (videos.online = 0 OR videos.online = 3)

SELECT SUM(statistic_value) AS used_quota_last_24h
FROM statistics
WHERE statistics.statistic_type = 'used_quota' AND statistics.statistic_date > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
SELECT statistic_value FROM statistics WHERE statistic_type = 'currently_downloading' LIMIT 1

SELECT
  c.channel_country AS country_code,
  COUNT(v.id) AS video_count
FROM
  ytbackup.videos v
  JOIN ytbackup.playlists p ON v.playlist = p.id
  JOIN ytbackup.channels c ON p.channel_id = c.id
WHERE
  v.downloaded IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  c.channel_country;
